law.catch_line: Repeal to prevail over amendment of same statute.
law.text: In the event of a conflict between a measure amending a statute and one repealing the same statute, the bill repealing the statute shall prevail unless the bill amending the statute specifically repeals the previous repeal.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 2, effective February 5, 1982.
